languages.text: "Сей раз будет последним. То, что ты по незнанию столь дерзко зовешь осколками, есть триединая реликвия, вместилище великого духа Предела рассвета, служителя самого Владыки, Меняющего Пути. Ты не досто{mf|ин|йна} узреть его... Но ты узришь".

"This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."
languages.original_text: "Сей раз будет последним. То, что ты по незнанию столь дерзко зовешь осколками, есть триединая реликвия, вместилище великого духа Предела рассвета, служителя самого Владыки, Меняющего Пути. Ты не досто{mf|ин|йна} узреть его... Но ты узришь".

traits.locale_text: "This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."

"This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."

languages.text: “这会是最后一次。你这无知之人，出言不逊地称它为‘碎片’，但它其实是三位一体的圣物，是容纳破晓锋刃的伟大容器。破晓锋刃所侍奉的主人，便是伟大的诡道之主。你不配看到他的面容……不过，你会看到的。”
languages.original_text: "This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."

traits.locale_text: “这会是最后一次。你这无知之人，出言不逊地称它为‘碎片’，但它其实是三位一体的圣物，是容纳破晓锋刃的伟大容器。破晓锋刃所侍奉的主人，便是伟大的诡道之主。你不配看到他的面容……不过，你会看到的。”

languages.text: « Cette dernière tentative sera la bonne. Ce que vous qualifiez d'éclat, dans votre ignorance, est en réalité une relique trinitaire, le siège du grand esprit de la Lame de l'Aube qui sert le maître en personne, l'Architecte du Changement. Vous ne méritez pas de contempler son visage... mais vous le ferez. »
languages.original_text: "This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."

traits.locale_text: « Cette dernière tentative sera la bonne. Ce que vous qualifiez d'éclat, dans votre ignorance, est en réalité une relique trinitaire, le siège du grand esprit de la Lame de l'Aube qui sert le maître en personne, l'Architecte du Changement. Vous ne méritez pas de contempler son visage... mais vous le ferez. »

languages.text: 「これが最後だ。お前たちが無知ゆえに図々しく破片と呼んでいるものは、本来は三位一体の遺物であり、夜明けの淵の偉大な精神の座であり、主である“方途を違える者”自身に仕えるものなのだ。お前たちはこの姿を見るに値しないが…刮目せよ」
languages.original_text: "This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."

traits.locale_text: 「これが最後だ。お前たちが無知ゆえに図々しく破片と呼んでいるものは、本来は三位一体の遺物であり、夜明けの淵の偉大な精神の座であり、主である“方途を違える者”自身に仕えるものなのだ。お前たちはこの姿を見るに値しないが…刮目せよ」

languages.text: «Este será el último. Lo que ignorantemente llamas fragmentos es en realidad una reliquia trina, el fundamento del gran espíritu llamado el Filo del Amanecer, que sirve a nuestro señor, El Que Cambia las Cosas. No mereces contemplarlo... pero lo harás».
languages.original_text: "This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."

traits.locale_text: «Este será el último. Lo que ignorantemente llamas fragmentos es en realidad una reliquia trina, el fundamento del gran espíritu llamado el Filo del Amanecer, que sirve a nuestro señor, El Que Cambia las Cosas. No mereces contemplarlo... pero lo harás».

languages.text: "Heute ist es das letzte Mal. Was Ihr in Eurer Ignoranz so dreist Splitter nennt, ist in Wahrheit ein dreifaltiges Relikt, der Sitz des großen Geists des Rands des Tagesanbruchs, der dem Meister selbst dient, dem Wandler der Wege. Ihr habt es nicht verdient, sein Antlitz zu erblicken ... doch das werdet Ihr."
languages.original_text: "This one will be the last. What you in your ignorance brazenly call shards is in truth a triune relic, the seat of the great spirit of the Edge of Daybreak, one who serves the master himself, the Changer of Ways. You do not deserve to behold his visage... but you will."
